messages.title: Election Comment
messages.content: This General Election has been called because the Government has no majority in the House of Commons and therefore cannot pass legislation, including Brexit measures.

messages.title: Let's be clear on Brexit
messages.content: I support leaving the EU, hopefully with a deal, but if not, I believe we must still respect the result of the referendum.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Support leaving the EU with a deal if possible, but leave regardless of a deal to respect the referendum result.
Campaign for the retention of A&E at Cheltenham General Hospital. Support increased funding for NHS and health services.
Backing Boris Johnson as Prime Minister and supporting his policies and leadership.

issues.economy: Believe in creating a thriving economy, supporting stronger public services.
issues.education: Believe strongly in the importance of education for young people.
issues.environment: Working to protect the environment, including animals and the countryside.
issues.health: Increase NHS funding. Keep A&E at Cheltenham General Hospital open.

leaflet.personalStatement: I have had the privilege of representing the Tewkesbury constituency in Parliament since 1997.

politicalExperience.achievements: Worked on several projects, visited various locations on official visits, and completed different constituency projects.

contactInformation.address: Unit H1a Regent Court, Gloucester Business Park, Gloucester, GL3 4AD

images.caption: Laurence Robertson working for you all the year round...
